{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=Archer C2 |revision=(US) v3.x
(Archer C900 v1.x (EU)) |series=AC900 |asin=B00K0MJ8DS, B00KATWRIY |newegg=N82E16833704436 |price=40 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Proware |fcc_date=10/20/2016 |fcc_id=TE7C2V3 |ic_id=8853A-C2V3 |pcb_id=1604242C2-3.0 |type=wireless router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |cpu1_model=QCA9563 |cpu1_cspeed=750 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=GigaDevice |fla1_model=GD25Q64CSIG |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9751G6KB-25 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9563 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QAC9887 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_txchains=1 |wi2_rxchains=1 |wi2_sstreams=1 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8337N |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=5GHz Front End Module;Skyworks;SKY85703-11;;1; |flags= |stock_boot=U-Boot |stock_os=Linux |tp_firmware=OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=TP-Link_XXXX, TP-Link_XXXX_5G |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=50:C7:BF |oui_eth=50:C7:BF }} {{TagLine|AC900 Wireless Dual Band Gigabit Router}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.tp-link.com/baltic/products/details/cat-9_Archer-C2-V3.html}} (v3) {{â€¢}} {{ProductPage|https://www.tp-link.com/us/products/details/Archer-C900.html}} (C900) {{SupportPage|vendor=TP-LINK|model=Archer-C900}} "1604242C2-3.0" and "Rev1.0sp3" is silkscreened on the C2 v3.0 (US) board. :"2050500784" and "1702" is silkscreened on the C2 v3.0 (EU) board. Power Supply: 12V/1A (US), 9V/0.85A (EU) *Web GUI: http://tplinkwifi.net Sold as the [[TP-LINK Archer C900 v1.1]] according to a photo in a listing on ebay.com *[https://forum.openwrt.org/t/support-for-tp-link-archer-c2-v3/15617 On '''OpenWrt''' forums] ==Images== File:DSC00385xx.jpg|Archer C2 (EU) ver:3.0 File:DSC00383xx.jpg|PCB top File:DSC00384xx.jpg|PCB bottom [[Has images::internal| ]] __NOTOC__
